description:
The No.1 Mahjong arcade game is coming back to Nintendo Switch™!

The basic mode is playing with NPC. Of course, you are able to enjoy one mahjong after another with girl.

・1P Mode
Everyone has an invisible anguish of heart and your mission is to save their soul.
The method is that you can solve problems by Mahjong. Well, solve them by Mahjong!
Take your chance! The story is kind of that.

・Jong-fight Mode
The blood, sweat and tears story of 2 men who continue to fight forever.
Anyway, I feel like "who are you guys?". That's it.

In addition, you can use a powerful and joyful technique with a wonderful support character called a Jongken.
name: Hot Gimmick Cosplay-jong for Nintendo Switch
